00026 $fileArray = array();
00027 foreach ($_POST as $key => $value) {
00028     if ($key != 'folder') {
00029         if (file_exists($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'] . $_POST['folder'] . '/' . $value)) {
00030             $fileArray[$key] = $value;
00031         }
00032     }
00033 }
00034 echo json_encode($fileArray);
00035 ?>
